text: Luis Carlos Ramos Lobo Filho (born 11 February 1999), commonly known as Luca Lobo, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a defender for Tulsa Roughnecks in the USL Championship.https://www.uslchampionship.com/luca- lobohttps://www.roughnecksfc.com/news_article/show/987262 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:FC Tulsa players Category:USL Championship players
title: Luca Lobo
